titles.title: USDA CROP Act of 2025
USDA Communication Regarding Oversight of Pesticides Act of 2025
USDA CROP Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to provide for improved coordination between the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and the Secretary of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
